LIMIT_MESSAGES.CONVERSATION: You have exceeded the conversation limit. Hacker plan allows only 500 conversations.
LIMIT_MESSAGES.INBOXES: You have exceeded the inbox limit. Hacker plan only supports website live-chat. Additional inboxes like email, WhatsApp etc. require a paid plan.
LIMIT_MESSAGES.AGENTS: You have exceeded the agent limit. Hacker plan allows only 2 agents.
LIMIT_MESSAGES.NON_ADMIN: Please contact your administrator to upgrade the plan and continue using all features.

GENERAL_SETTINGS.TITLE: アカウント設定

UPDATE.ERROR: 設定を更新できませんでした。もう一度お試しください
UPDATE.SUCCESS: アカウント設定が正常に更新されました

ACCOUNT_DELETE_SECTION.TITLE: Delete your Account
ACCOUNT_DELETE_SECTION.NOTE: Once you delete your account, all your data will be deleted.

CONFIRM.TITLE: Delete Account
CONFIRM.MESSAGE: Deleting your Account is irreversible. Enter your account name below to confirm you want to permanently delete it.
CONFIRM.PLACE_HOLDER: {accountName}と入力して確認してください

ACCOUNT_DELETE_SECTION.FAILURE: Could not delete account, try again!

SCHEDULED_DELETION.TITLE: Account Scheduled for Deletion
SCHEDULED_DELETION.MESSAGE_MANUAL: This account is scheduled for deletion on {deletionDate}. This was requested by an administrator. You can cancel the deletion before this date.
SCHEDULED_DELETION.MESSAGE_INACTIVITY: This account is scheduled for deletion on {deletionDate} due to account inactivity. You can cancel the deletion before this date.

FORM.ERROR: 正しくフォームに入力してください

ACCOUNT_ID.TITLE: アカウントID
ACCOUNT_ID.NOTE: APIベースの統合を構築する場合に必要なIDです

AUTO_RESOLVE.TITLE: Auto-resolve conversations
AUTO_RESOLVE.NOTE: This configuration would allow you to automatically resolve the conversation after a certain period. Set the duration and customize the message to the user below.

NAME.LABEL: アカウント名
NAME.PLACEHOLDER: あなたのアカウント名
NAME.ERROR: 正しいアカウント名を入力してください

DOMAIN.LABEL: 受信メールドメイン
DOMAIN.PLACEHOLDER: メールを受信するドメイン

SUPPORT_EMAIL.LABEL: サポートメール
SUPPORT_EMAIL.PLACEHOLDER: 会社のサポートメールアドレス

AUTO_RESOLVE_IGNORE_WAITING.LABEL: Exclude unattended conversations
AUTO_RESOLVE_IGNORE_WAITING.HELP: When enabled, the system will skip resolving conversations that are still waiting for an agent’s reply.

AUTO_RESOLVE_DURATION.LABEL: Inactivity duration for resolution
AUTO_RESOLVE_DURATION.HELP: Duration after a conversation should auto resolve if there is no activity
AUTO_RESOLVE_DURATION.ERROR: Auto resolve duration should be between 10 minutes and 999 days

API.ERROR: Failed to update auto resolve settings

AUTO_RESOLVE_DURATION.MESSAGE_PLACEHOLDER: Conversation was marked resolved by system due to 15 days of inactivity
AUTO_RESOLVE_DURATION.MESSAGE_HELP: This message is sent to the customer when a conversation is automatically resolved by the system due to inactivity.

FEATURES.INBOUND_EMAIL_ENABLED: あなたのアカウントでは、メールでの会話が継続可能です。
FEATURES.CUSTOM_EMAIL_DOMAIN_ENABLED: カスタムドメインでのメール受信が有効になりました。

GENERAL_SETTINGS.UPDATE_CHATWOOT: Chatwootのアップデート {latestChatwootVersion} が利用可能です。インスタンスを更新してください。
GENERAL_SETTINGS.PAYMENT_PENDING: お支払いが保留中です。支払い情報を更新してChatwootの利用を継続してください。
GENERAL_SETTINGS.LIMITS_UPGRADE: アカウントの使用制限を超えました。プランをアップグレードして利用を続けてください。
